title: Blue essence problem
body:
I've been playing league today and I notice how my blue essences aren't growing when I play, does that have to do with me not being lvl 30 on this account, or is this a bug, or this a design where you can only own blue essences when leveling up?  I need some help with this and I'm quite worried that I wont be able to get any blue essences.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: You used to get IP after every match, but Blue Essence doesn't quite work that way. You can get some BE from capsules or from disenchanting champion shards you get from capsules as well.
OH! Thank you for telling me this, I was really confused but this helped a lot, thanks!
